title: Purchasable Login Screen.
body:
With the new Update to the [Starguardian Loginscreen](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gB3ZsZG4aeI) I've wonderd what the Community would think of beeing able to Buy and Select your favorite one.

Since the new Alpha client is beeing prepared I would imagine there is still enough time to implement it.

replies.body:
There is a trick to change the login screen.
The login screen files are at C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\0.0.1.219\deploy\mod\lgn\themes
You can copy the loginscreen you want and rename it to the current loginscreen.

For example let's say you want the ivern login instead the star guardian one:
rename the folder "loginYorick" at the path named above to "loginJinxStarGuardian"(and delete the previus "loginJinxStarGuardian" folder).

I did not test this for the current patch but it worked just fine a few patches ago.

You should keep a backup of the whole "themes" folder just to be sure.
